Post.title: CENTOS YUM
Post._content:
{% asset_img centos-logo.png%}

### 

CentOS yum CentOSCentOS

yumyumyumCentOS `/etc/yum.repos.d/` 

<!-- more -->

### 

****

>  http://ftp.sjtu.edu.cn/centos/

M

 CentOS-Base.repo

> http://centos.ustc.edu.cn

  `CentOS`

****

> sohuhttp://mirrors.sohu.com/



>  http://mirrors.163.com/centos


 ping 

###  (  CentOS7  )

> CentOS-Base.repo  /etc/yum.repos.d/

```
[base]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Base
baseurl=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/7/os/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6 

[updates]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Updates
baseurl=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/7/updates/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

[addons]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Addons
baseurl=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/$releasever/addons/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-7

[extras]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Extras
baseurl=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/7/extras/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-7

[centosplus]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Plus
baseurl=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/7/centosplus/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=0
gpgkey=http://mirrors.163.com/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-7
```

---

  [base]  [updates]  [addons]  [extras]  [centosplus]   

`baseurl``gpgkey`

yumyum

```
yum clean all && yum clean metadata && yum clean dbcache && yum makecache && yum update
```

Post.title: Docker-Hub
Post._content:
>  Docker 

#### 

**DockerLinuxdefaultDocker**

<!-- more -->

```
docker-machine create --engine-registry-mirror=https://xxxx.mirror.aliyuncs.com -d virtualbox default
```

DockerDocker

```
docker-machine env default
eval "$(docker-machine env default)"
docker info
```

 xxxx 

#### 

** Docker VM**

```
docker-machine ssh default
sudo vi /var/lib/boot2docker/profile
```

EXTRA_ARGS

```
--registry-mirror=https://xxxx.mirror.aliyuncs.com
```

Docker

```
sudo /etc/init.d/docker restart
```

Post.title: Python  pyenv
Post._content:
## 



*    Python  2.6 Python 2.7 
*    Python  2.x Python 3.x

{% asset_img python-pyenv-logo.png [python-pyenv-logo] %}

 Python Python Python [pyenv](https://github.com/yyuu/pyenv)  Python 

<!-- more -->

##  Pyenv

 pyenv 

```
$ curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yyuu/pyenv-installer/master/bin/pyenv-installer | bash
```
 `~/.bashrc` :

```
export PYENV_ROOT="$HOME/.pyenv"
export PATH="$PYENV_ROOT/bin:$PATH"
eval "$(pyenv init -)"
eval "$(pyenv virtualenv-init -)"   # 
```


##  Python

```
$ pyenv install --list
```
 pyenv  Python :

```
2.7.8   # Python 2 
3.6.3   # Python 3 
anaconda2-4.1.0  #  Python 2.6  2.7
anaconda3-4.1.0  #  Python 3.3  3.4
```
 2.7.8  3.6.3  Python  `anaconda2-4.1.0`   

###  Python 

 Python 

** CentOS/RHEL/Fedora :**

```
sudo yum install readline readline-devel readline-static
sudo yum install openssl openssl-devel openssl-static
sudo yum install sqlite-devel
sudo yum install bzip2-devel bzip2-libs
```

** Ubuntu**

```
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install make build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev
sudo apt-get install libbz2-dev libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev wget curl
sudo apt-get install llvm libncurses5-dev libncursesw5-dev
```
### 

 `pyenv install`  python

```
pyenv install 3.6.3
## ... 
```


### 

 Python 

```
$ pyenv rehash
```

###  python 

```
$ pyenv versions
* system (set by /home/seisman/.pyenv/version)
anaconda3-4.1.0
```

 python

###  python 

```
$ pyenv global 3.6.3
$ pyenv versions
  system
* 3.6.3 (set by PYENV_VERSION environment variable)
```
 python  3.6.3 `pyenv local`  `pyenv shell` python 

###  python 

```
$ python
Python 3.6.3 (default, Oct 23 2017, 12:15:23)
[GCC 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-17)] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information
>>>
```

##  python

*    `python`  python
*    `/usr/bin/python`  python
*    `pip` python
*    `pip`  `pyenv rehash` 

## pyenv 

1.  `pyenv uninstall` 
2.  `pyenv update`  pyenv 

## 

1.  [https://github.com/yyuu/pyenv](https://github.com/yyuu/pyenv)

Post.title: RancherOS
Post._content:
** RancherOS **

![rancheros](https://github.com/rancher/os/blob/master/docs/rancheros.png?raw=true)

### 

>  RancherOS  OSChina  Docker  RancherOS Linux4.x  Docker 20M(1.0.459M  M  Linux OS)
    
>  RancherOS  Docker 

<!-- more -->

### 

https://github.com/rancher/os

`v1.0.4 - Docker 17.03.1-ce - Linux 4.9.40`

ISO https://releases.rancher.com/os/latest/rancheros.iso

### 

> The RancherOS ISO file can be used to create a fresh RancherOS install on KVM, VMware, VirtualBox, or bare metal servers. 

RancherOS  ISO  KVMVMwareVirtualBox 

> You must boot with at least 512MB of memory. If you boot with the ISO, you will automatically be logged in as the rancher user. Only the ISO is set to use autologin by default. If you run from a cloud or install to disk, SSH keys or a password of your choice is expected to be used.

512M  ISO `rancher` ISO  SSH Keys rancher  SSH key 

---



#### 

>  ISO  RancherOS`rancher`;

** Configuration**

`cloud-config.yml`yml 

> A cloud-config file can be used to provide configuration when first booting RancherOS.

```yml
#cloud-config
hostname: ros-rmbp
rancher:
  docker:
    tls: true
  network:
    dns:
      nameservers:
      - 8.8.8.8
      - 8.8.4.4
  write_files:
    - container: ntp
      path: /etc/ntp.conf
      permissions: "0644"
      owner: root
      content: |
        server 0.cn.pool.ntp.org iburst
        server 1.cn.pool.ntp.org iburst
        server 2.cn.pool.ntp.org iburst
        server 3.cn.pool.ntp.org iburst

        # Allow only time queries, at a limited rate, sending KoD when in excess.
        # Allow all local queries (IPv4, IPv6)
        restrict default nomodify nopeer noquery limited kod
        restrict 127.0.0.1
        restrict [::1]

ssh_authorized_keys:
  - ssh-rsa AAAAB3Nza......(256)
```

****

 HTTP  RancherOS  Mac  python http  Server RancherOS  wget  Dowanload 

 Shell

```
$ sudo mv cloud-config.yml /var/lib/rancher/conf/
$ sudo ros install -c /var/lib/rancher/conf/cloud-config.yml -d /dev/sda

##  Y/N  Y
## rancher 
##   SSH Keys  ssh rancher@IP
```
** Docker-Compose**

```
##  curl command wget 
wget https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.15.0/docker-compose-Linux-x86_64

sudo mv docker-compose-Linux-x86_64 /usr/local/bin/docker-compose

chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
```
****

 RancherOS  Docker

```
$ docker ps 
$ docker images
```

### RancherOS
Post.raw:
---
title: RancherOS 
date: 2017-08-17 20:12:50
categories: Docker
tags: 
  - Docker
  - Linux
permalink: rancher-free-style
---

** RancherOS **

![rancheros](https://github.com/rancher/os/blob/master/docs/rancheros.png?raw=true)

### 

>  RancherOS  OSChina  Docker  RancherOS Linux4.x  Docker 20M(1.0.459M  M  Linux OS)
    
>  RancherOS  Docker 

<!-- more -->

### 

https://github.com/rancher/os

`v1.0.4 - Docker 17.03.1-ce - Linux 4.9.40`

ISO https://releases.rancher.com/os/latest/rancheros.iso

### 

> The RancherOS ISO file can be used to create a fresh RancherOS install on KVM, VMware, VirtualBox, or bare metal servers. 

RancherOS  ISO  KVMVMwareVirtualBox 

> You must boot with at least 512MB of memory. If you boot with the ISO, you will automatically be logged in as the rancher user. Only the ISO is set to use autologin by default. If you run from a cloud or install to disk, SSH keys or a password of your choice is expected to be used.

512M  ISO `rancher` ISO  SSH Keys rancher  SSH key 

---



#### 

>  ISO  RancherOS`rancher`;

** Configuration**

`cloud-config.yml`yml 

> A cloud-config file can be used to provide configuration when first booting RancherOS.

```yml
#cloud-config
hostname: ros-rmbp
rancher:
  docker:
    tls: true
  network:
    dns:
      nameservers:
      - 8.8.8.8
      - 8.8.4.4
  write_files:
    - container: ntp
      path: /etc/ntp.conf
      permissions: "0644"
      owner: root
      content: |
        server 0.cn.pool.ntp.org iburst
        server 1.cn.pool.ntp.org iburst
        server 2.cn.pool.ntp.org iburst
        server 3.cn.pool.ntp.org iburst

        # Allow only time queries, at a limited rate, sending KoD when in excess.
        # Allow all local queries (IPv4, IPv6)
        restrict default nomodify nopeer noquery limited kod
        restrict 127.0.0.1
        restrict [::1]

ssh_authorized_keys:
  - ssh-rsa AAAAB3Nza......(256)
```

****

 HTTP  RancherOS  Mac  python http  Server RancherOS  wget  Dowanload 

 Shell

```
$ sudo mv cloud-config.yml /var/lib/rancher/conf/
$ sudo ros install -c /var/lib/rancher/conf/cloud-config.yml -d /dev/sda

##  Y/N  Y
## rancher 
##   SSH Keys  ssh rancher@IP
```
** Docker-Compose**

```
##  curl command wget 
wget https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.15.0/docker-compose-Linux-x86_64

sudo mv docker-compose-Linux-x86_64 /usr/local/bin/docker-compose

chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
```
****

 RancherOS  Docker

```
$ docker ps 
$ docker images
```

### RancherOS

Post.title: JVM()
Post._content:
> 
> 
>

## 1

[Cassandra](http://github.com/apache/cassandra/blob/trunk/conf/jvm.options) [](http://tobert.github.io/pages/als-cassandra-21-tuning-guide.html)

[JVM"" R](http://hllvm.group.iteye.com/group/topic/27945)JDK6
`Linkedin`[](http://www.importnew.com/11336.html)
[](http://www.techpaste.com/2012/02/java-command-line-options-jvm-performance-improvement/)
[JVM](http://ifeve.com/useful-jvm-flags/)

<!-- more -->

## 2
```
-XX:+PrintFlagsFinal
```
`-XX: +PrintFlagsFinal`...

JDK7JDK8JDK7JDK

`-version`

```shell
java -server -Xmx1024m -Xms1024m -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+PrintFlagsFinal -version| grep ParallelGCThreads
```

## 3

JDK8`-XX:+TieredCompilation`JDK7JDK7u40`-XX:+OptimizeStringConcat`

JDK()

## 

> 

### 
```
-XX:-UseBiasedLocking
```

JDK1.6synchronized

JVM[JVM`Stop The World`](http://calvin1978.blogcn.com/articles/safepoint.html) `RevokeBiasd `GC`Stop The World``Cassandra `

### IntLong
```
-XX:AutoBoxCacheMax=20000
```
`Integer i = 3;` intIntegerJDK -128 ~ +127int  longInteger20000QPS48,00050,0004%[Java Integer(-128~127)==equals](http://blog.csdn.net/chengzhezhijian/article/details/9628251)
 

### 
```
-XX:+AlwaysPreTouch
```
GC
 

### JVMstatistics
```
-XX:+PerfDisableSharedMem
```
CassandraIOJVMJVM/tmp/hperf `statistics``PageCache``Stop the World`JVM`statistics`jps, jstat JMXJMXjstat[The Four Month Bug: JVM statistics cause garbage collection pauses](http://www.evanjones.ca/jvm-mmap-pause.html)

### SHA1
```
-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom
```
TomcatSHA1PRNG`/dev/random``SecureRandom``SHA1` `SHA1PRNG``NativePRNG``synchronized`SHA1[SecureRandom](SecureRandom)

### 

1. `-XX:+AggressiveOpts`, `-XX:AutoBoxCacheMax``-XX:+AggressiveOpts``-XX:-AggressiveOpts`JDK

2. Linkined`VMOptions`
```
	-XX:+UnlockDiagnosticVMOptions -XX: ParGCCardsPerStrideChunk=32768
```

3. `JIT Compile`

4. `-XX:+UseFastAccessorMethods`JDK6

5. `-server`64linux`-client`
 
### 

1. `-Djava.awt.headless=true`[Java SE `Headless`](http://www.oschina.net/translate/using-headless-mode-in-java-se)

2. `-XX:-UseCounterDecay`JITGCC21

3. `-XX:-TieredCompilation`JDK8C1C2C2

## GC
### GC
8GCMSG1

CMS[JVMCMS](http://ifeve.com/useful-jvm-flags-part-7-cms-collector/)

1. 
```
-XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction=75 -XX:+UseCMSInitiatingOccupancyOnly
```
	JMX90%75%Full GC(`CMS GC`JVM`Full GC`)`-XX:+UseCMSInitiatingOccupancyOnly`75JVM

2. `-XX:MaxTenuringThreshold=2`GCSurvivorYoung GCJDK7615

	Young GCGCYoung GC

	`-XX:+PrintTenuringDistribution`JMeter226

3. `-XX:+ExplicitGCInvokesConcurrent` `-XX:+DisableExplicitGC` [Netty](http://calvin1978.blogcn.com/articles/directbytebuffer.html)`system.gc()``-XX+ExplicitGCInvokesConcurrent``full gc`ygcremark[JVMSystemGC](http://lovestblog.cn/blog/2015/05/07/system-gc/)

4. `-XX: ParallelRefProcEnabled`, `false``Reference``WeakReference``GC log``Reference`JVM

### GC

1. `-XX:+CMSClassUnloadingEnabled`CMSClass`Full GC`JDK7JDK8Groovy`CMS remark`

2. CMS`-XX:+UseParNewGC`

3. 
```
ParallelGCThreads8+( Processor - 8 ) ( 5/8 )
ConcGCThreads = (ParallelGCThreads + 3)/4
```
	CPU248`ParallelGCThreads``ParallelGCThreads18` `ConcGCThreads5`
	
4. `-XX:+CMSScavengeBeforeRemark`CMS remarkminor GCCMS remarkGCremark`YGC`

5. `-XX:CMSFullGCsBeforeCompaction`0full gcFull GC  75%`CMS GC``System.gc()`100%[R](http://hllvm.group.iteye.com/group/topic/28854)

### 
> 

> JVM-Xmx(cache)

> 

1. `-Xmx, -Xms`, 24GGC

2. `-Xmn or -XX:NewSize and -XX:MaxNewSize or -XX:NewRatio`JDK1/3  GCGC2/3-Xmn (`-XX:NewSize and -XX:MaxNewSize`)NewRatio1(-Xmn)

3. `-XX: PermSize=128m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m(JDK7)`Hibernate/SpringAOP64M128MMax

4. `-XX:MetaspaceSize=128m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=512mJDK8`JDK8128M512M

### 

1. `-XX:SurvivorRatio`81/10`1/(SurvivorRatio+2)`GC Log

2. `-Xss`1M256KJSON

3. `-XX:MaxDirectMemorySize`/HeapSurvivor[Netty](http://calvin1978.blogcn.com/articles/directbytebuffer.html)

4. `-XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize` JITJDK748M96MJDK8240MJMX`CodeCache`JDK748M

### GC

1. 
```
-Xloggc:/dev/shm/gc-myapplication.log -XX:+PrintGCDateStamps -XX:+PrintGCDetails
```
	[JVMGC](http://ifeve.com/useful-jvm-flags-part-8-gc-logging/)GC

	IOGCflush pageCache GC logGC/dev/shm [Eliminating Large JVM GC Pauses Caused by Background IO Traffic](http://calvin1978.blogcn.com/articles/%E2%80%9Chttp://engineering.linkedin.com/blog/2016/02/eliminating-large-jvm-gc-pauses-caused-by-background-io-traffic%E2%80%9D)

	+PrintGCDateStampsPrintGCTimeStamps

2. -XX:+PrintGCApplicationStoppedTimeGCclass agent redefinecode deoptimization"-XX:+PrintSafepointStatistics -XX: PrintSafepointStatisticsCount=1" 

3. GC"-XX:+UseGCLogFileRotation -XX:NumberOfGCLogFiles=10 -XX:GCLogFileSize=1M"

## 

> JVM

### -XX:+PrintCommandLineFlags
stdout
CMS-XX:+UseParNewGC

### -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow
`StackTrace `N(?)JVMNPE`Nul Point Exception`NPE 
 
### coredump -XX:ErrorFile
JVM crashhotspot errorJVM%pPID

```
-XX:ErrorFile=${MYLOGDIR}/hs_err_%p.log
```
coredumpCoreDumpHeap Dump  Thread Dump crash

`ulimit -c unlimited`root

```
echo "/{MYLOGDIR}/coredump.%p" > /proc/sys/kernel/core_pattern
```
coredumpJVM Segment Fault
 
### -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError
`Out Of Memory`JVMHeap Dump

JVM`java_pid${pid}.hprof`

```
-XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -XX:HeapDumpPath=${LOGDIR}/
```

### JMX
```
Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.port=${MY_JMX_PORT} -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=false -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=false -Djava.rmi.server.hostname=127.0.0.1
```
ZabbixJMXJVM

## 

### 
```
-XX:-UseBiasedLocking -XX:-UseCounterDecay -XX:AutoBoxCacheMax=20000 -XX:+PerfDisableSharedMem -XX:+AlwaysPreTouch -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom
```
### (JDK7)
```
-Xms4096m -Xmx4096m -Xmn2048m -XX:MaxDirectMemorySize=4096m-XX: PermSize=256m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m -XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=240M
```
### CMS GC 
```
-XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction=75 -XX:+UseCMSInitiatingOccupancyOnly -XX:MaxTenuringThreshold=6 -XX:+ExplicitGCInvokesConcurrent -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled
```
### GC  
```
-Xloggc:/dev/shm/app-gc.log -XX:+PrintGCApplicationStoppedTime -XX:+PrintGCDateStamps -XX:+PrintGCDetails
```
###   
```
-XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -XX:ErrorFile=${LOGDIR}/hs_err_%p.log -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -XX:HeapDumpPath=${LOGDIR}/
```
### JMX
3.5

---
`` [JVM(2016)](http://calvin1978.blogcn.com/articles/jvmoption-2.html)
